buildPhases.description: Webhook receives new social media posts from external platforms to initiate the content moderation workflow. Posts are received via HTTP POST requests.
Transform and normalize incoming social media post data, extracting key fields like content, author, platform, and metadata to prepare for AI analysis.
AI-powered content analysis using OpenAI to detect inappropriate material, hate speech, harassment, and other policy violations with confidence scoring.
Route posts based on AI analysis results, separating flagged inappropriate content from clean content for different storage and handling paths.
Store both flagged and clean content analysis results in PostgreSQL database with detailed metadata, confidence scores, and violation categories for audit trail.
Daily scheduled trigger that initiates the digest email workflow to generate and send moderation reports to administrators at 9 AM each day.
Retrieve daily content moderation statistics from the database, including all posts analyzed in the last 24 hours for report generation.
Generate comprehensive daily report summary with statistics, severity breakdowns, platform analysis, and details of top flagged items for moderator review.
Send formatted daily digest email to moderators containing moderation statistics, flagged content summaries, and actionable insights for content review.

## ðŸ“¥ Triggers

parameters.content:
## ðŸš€ Grow your AI business

Need help in implementing this workflow for your business? Join the Ghost Team community.

This workflow is made with ðŸ’š by Ghost Team.

## ðŸ“¥ Triggers
Webhook receives new social media posts from external platforms to initiate the content moderation workflow. Posts are received via HTTP POST requests.

Daily scheduled trigger that initiates the digest email workflow to generate and send moderation reports to administrators at 9 AM each day.

## ðŸ“Š Inputs
Retrieve daily content moderation statistics from the database, including all posts analyzed in the last 24 hours for report generation.

## âš™ï¸ Transform
Transform and normalize incoming social media post data, extracting key fields like content, author, platform, and metadata to prepare for AI analysis.

AI-powered content analysis using OpenAI to detect inappropriate material, hate speech, harassment, and other policy violations with confidence scoring.

## ðŸ”€ Decision
Route posts based on AI analysis results, separating flagged inappropriate content from clean content for different storage and handling paths.

## ðŸ”„ Aggregation
Generate comprehensive daily report summary with statistics, severity breakdowns, platform analysis, and details of top flagged items for moderator review.

## ðŸš€ Outputs
Store both flagged and clean content analysis results in PostgreSQL database with detailed metadata, confidence scores, and violation categories for audit trail.

Send formatted daily digest email to moderators containing moderation statistics, flagged content summaries, and actionable insights for content review.
